resources.string: "Securely save your cryptographic identity and message keys on the server for viewing message history on other devices."
"Key storage must be turned on to set up recovery."
"Use a recovery key to restore your cryptographic identity and message history if you no longer have access to your devices."
"Your key storage is currently out of sync."
"Get access to your encrypted messages if you lose all your devices or are signed out of %1$s everywhere."
"When asked to verify your device, select %1$s"
"Follow the instructions to create a new recovery key"
"Save your new recovery key in a password manager or encrypted note"
"Reset the encryption for your account using another device"
"Your account information, contacts, preferences, and chat list will be preserved."
"Message history that is stored solely on the server will be lost."
"Verification of all your devices and contacts will be required again."
"Reset your identity only if you're unable to access another signed-in device and have lost your recovery key."
"A reset of your identity is required"
"You will lose your encrypted messages if you are signed out of all devices."
"Are you sure you want to turn off backup?"
"By deleting key storage, your cryptographic identity and message keys will be wiped from the server, and the following security features will be disabled:"
"You won\'t have access to encrypted message history on new devices"
"Signing out of %1$s on all devices will result in the loss of access to your encrypted messages"
"Do you really want to turn off key storage and delete it?"
"In case you\'ve lost your recovery key, generate a new one. Your previous key will be deactivated after the change."
"Make sure nobody can see this screen!"
"Please try again to confirm access to your key storage."
"You can also enter your secret key or secret phrase here as well."
"Put this recovery key in a secure location, such as a physical safe, an encrypted note, or a password manager."
"Keep Your Recovery Key in a Secure Location"
"After this step, the new recovery key will no longer be available to you."
Did You Store Your Recovery Key?"
"A recovery key protects your key storage. To generate a new one after setup, choose the 'Change Recovery Key' option."
"Are you sure about resetting your identity?"
"An unknown error happened. Please check your account password is correct and try again."
"Verify that you want to reset your identity."
